text: @AliVelshi The BLS seems to be fingering the Census Bureau (Wilbur Ross) of cooking the unemployment rate.  This has continued several months despite "efforts" by Wilbur Ross to correct the issue for the last three months.  Page 11 from the BLS document. https://t.co/gvTp1TtpT3  Big story, https://t.co/0uF3z9tYi4
